scripts.test:docker: TEST_COMMAND="npm ci && npm run migrate:apply && npm run test:integration" docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --abort-on-container-exit --remove-orphans
scripts.test:integration: vitest run routes/v1/auth/__tests__/auth.integration.test.js && vitest run routes/v1/auth/__tests__/entitlements.integration.test.js && vitest run routes/v1/users/invitations/__tests__/invitations.integration.test.js
scripts.migrate: npx drizzle-kit generate && npx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.coverage: TEST_COMMAND="npm ci && npm run migrate:apply && npm run test:coverage:inner" docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --abort-on-container-exit --remove-orphans
